subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Paul Byrd won his fifth consecutive decision and extended his streak without issuing a walk to 43 innings, and the Cleveland Indians came from behind for an 8-4 victory yesterday against the Red Sox at Fenway Park.
snippet: Paul Byrd won his fifth consecutive decision and extended his streak without issuing a walk to 43 innings, and the Cleveland Indians came from behind for an 8-4 victory yesterday against the Red Sox at Fenway Park.
